de.upb.t2t.control.database.editing

Class OfflineHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.upb.t2t.control.database.editing.AbstractDatabaseEditingHandler
      • de.upb.t2t.control.database.editing.OfflineHandler

  • public class OfflineHandler
extends AbstractDatabaseEditingHandler
    An implementation of the AbstractDatabaseEditingHandler that provides offline editing functionality. Therefore, it is nothing more than a wrapper for the AbstractSQLiteBridge class. This may seem unnecessary at first sight. However, components such as the AddTranscriptionPane which offer database editing functionality may do so in both an online, offline, or yet another fashion - hence this class.
    Author:
    Michel May (michel-may@gmx.de)
